page.title: 08A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: SATURDAY 29th. JUNE 1985 07.40am Woke-up, washed and dressed. 07.45am Cleaned out pet guinea pigs cage. 0840am Breakfast, cereal, toast and marmalade. 09.40am Washed dishes, tidied bedroom. 10.00am Watched television. 10.45am Shopping in Bridgwater, butchers,Sainsbury's, Marks & Spencers. 01.20pm Lunch, cold chicken and salad. 02.00pm Played games for afternoon. 06.00pm Dinner, roast beef,potatoes,cauliflower,yorkshire puddings, pavlova. 07.15pm Visited grandparents. 08.30pm Returned home. 09.15pm Bed.
